title: Unable to create or join game
body: Finished a game - now unable to create or join a game, every mode says its unavailable

replies.body:
Things will hopefully be back to normal soon!

Updates from Mindstar in this thread: https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/Ntey9fRZ/d/s0vZ3I7n

You can also follow the updates through the red tracker: https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/redtracker

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Thanks All is working now Hurrah!
same, even tried relogging to see if it was jsut client side
I've run a repair, restarted client and relogged a whole bunch and nothing works
